tool_description: Real time access to Versed AI's supply chain mapping data.
name: Supply Chain API
title: Supply Chain API

api_list.name: Cluster Edge Lookup
api_list.description: Returns a group edge given the group edge id.

required_parameters.name: cluster_edge_id
required_parameters.description: A unique value identifying this cluster edge.

api_list.name: Company Search - Aliases
api_list.description: Search for companies across all known company name aliases.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

api_list.name: Company VID Lookup
api_list.description: Find a company in the Versed DB based on it's Versed ID.

required_parameters.name: vid
required_parameters.description: A unique value identifying this company.

api_list.name: Company Customers
api_list.description: Query the customers of a company based on the Versed ID.

required_parameters.name: vid
required_parameters.description: A unique value identifying this company.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: (YYYY-MM-DD) Earliest date of evidence supporting customer relationships.

optional_parameters.name: child_relationships_only
optional_parameters.description: (Default: False) If true, only return relationships connected to child companies.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

optional_parameters.name: confidence_score
optional_parameters.description: [0.0 to 0.1] Minimum confidence score for the relationships.

items.description: Base serializer for list of companies

api_list.name: Company Search
api_list.description: Search for companies based on their name, url or identifier (e.g. permID).

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: The company name.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

optional_parameters.name: ordering
optional_parameters.description: Ordering

optional_parameters.name: include_subsidiaries
optional_parameters.description: Search all companies in database. Default: False (search parent companies and unclustered companies)

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: A 3 letter country code (ISO3166). Retrieve companies with at least one address in this country.

optional_parameters.name: city
optional_parameters.description: A city name. Note this uses fuzzy matching and retrieves companies with at least one address in this city.

optional_parameters.name: domain
optional_parameters.description: The company domain. E.g boeing.com. Note this uses exact matching and should inputs should NOT include www, http or https.

optional_parameters.name: identifier
optional_parameters.description: Any other identifier such as permid or wikidata.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

api_list.name: Evidence Lookup
api_list.description: Returns an evidence given the evidence id.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: A unique value identifying this evidence.

api_list.name: Company Suppliers
api_list.description: Given a Versed ID, retrieve company suppliers.

required_parameters.name: vid
required_parameters.description: A unique value identifying this company.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The initial index from which to return the results.

optional_parameters.name: confidence_score
optional_parameters.description: [0.0 to 0.1] Minimum confidence score for the relationships.

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: (YYYY-MM-DD) Earliest date of evidence supporting customer relationships.

optional_parameters.name: child_relationships_only
optional_parameters.description: (Default: False) If true, only return relationships connected to child companies.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to return per page.

api_list.name: Edge Lookup
api_list.description: Returns an edge given the edge id.

required_parameters.name: edge_id
required_parameters.description: A unique value identifying this edge.
